thread.title: Rail delays between Southampton and London Waterloo
thread.title_full: Rail delays between Southampton and London Waterloo

title: Rail delays between Southampton and London Waterloo
text:
0 comments 
COMMUTERS can expect delays after disruption to trains running between Hampshire and London. 
Services running to the capital are delayed by 15 minutes or may be cancelled altogether due to signalling problems between Basingstoke and Woking. 
The disruptions are expected until 9.45am. 
A statement by South West Trains released this morning said: “Our engineers have found a fault with the signalling on one of our fast lines into London. 
“The fault means that all services travelling from Basingstoke to London will only be able to use one line between Farnborough and Brookwood. Share article 
“Some services may need to be altered at short notice.” 
Passengers are advised to see journeycheck.southwesttrains.co.uk for details. Promoted Stories Rail delays between Southampton and London Waterloo   Keep in touch with local news
